titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the week of September 15, 2014, through September 21, 2014, as "Balance Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 9/17/2014--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of September 15-September 21, 2014, as Balance Awareness Week, and recognizes the importance of raising public awareness about vestibular (inner ear balance) disorders.
